description: Cider Club Bazaleti is an innovative initiative focused on sustainable practices in the food and beverage industry. Founded by a husband-and-wife team, it operates as an eco-hub that combines cider production with educational programs. The project emphasizes recycling, local sourcing, and creating unique flavors while fostering community engagement. Their mission is to promote sustainability and quality over quantity, aiming to revolutionize food consumption in Georgia while training local specialists for future growth.
name: Cider Club Bazaleti
